org.apache.twill.internal

Class TwillRuntimeSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.internal.TwillRuntimeSpecification

  • public class TwillRuntimeSpecification
extends Object
    Represents runtime specification of a TwillApplication.
